title: Get 16% OFF the Google TV Streamer with this Offer!
description: Upgrade your older TV with smart streaming features! The post Get 16% OFF the Google TV Streamer with this Offer! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Upgrade your older TV with smart streaming features!
text: If you’re looking to upgrade your older TV set to a newer one with “smart” features, then you don’t really need to buy a full TV outright—buyers after a convenient and affordable way to access content streaming platforms might want to check out the Google TV Streamer, which is currently on sale for $84 thanks to this deal on Amazon. Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Review (SAVE $400!) If you’re curious about its features, the Google TV Streamer comes with support for 4K HDR with Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos, 32GB of local storage, support for Gemini software features, compatibility with Matter devices, as well as other Google Home-supported hardware products. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart. html:
If you’re looking to upgrade your older TV set to a newer one with “smart” features, then you don’t really need to buy a full TV outright—buyers after a convenient and affordable way to access content streaming platforms might want to check out the Google TV Streamer, which is currently on sale for $84 thanks to this deal on Amazon.

Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Review (SAVE $400!)

If you’re curious about its features, the Google TV Streamer comes with support for 4K HDR with Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos, 32GB of local storage, support for Gemini software features, compatibility with Matter devices, as well as other Google Home-supported hardware products. You can check it out using the link below.
